Content.summary: 'Personal/Non-profit license for Umbraco backup' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about GBP, EUR, USD, Human Interest, Social Issues, Technology Internet written on 19 September 2006
Content.tags: GBP, EUR, USD, Human Interest, Social Issues, Technology Internet
Content.bodyText:
I have added a Personal/Non-profit license to Umbraco backup.

This license allows you to use all of the features of Umbraco Backup for £15 (US$28 or €22).

In order to take advantage of this license, your site must be a personal website, a registered charity or a non profit organisation.
